summary: A collection of utilities and base classes that support Ansible's shell execution plugins. It provides mechanisms to build and safely quote command strings, handle filesystem paths, manage temporary files, perform checksum calculations, and address encoding and permission concerns for both POSIX shells and PowerShell.
business_intent: To enable Ansible playbooks to run arbitrary shell commands reliably on remote systems by abstracting shell-specific quoting, command construction, and file management, thereby ensuring consistent and secure remote execution across different operating environments.
